00164 //-----------------------------------------------------
00165 // Function
00166 //-----------------------------------------------------
00167  function ShowReportResult($p_array) {
00168    
00169    echo '<TABLE class="result">';
00170    echo "<TR>".
00171      "<TH> Description </TH>".
00172      "<TH> montant </TH>".
00173      "</TR>";
00174    $i=0;
00175    foreach ( $p_array as $op ) { 
00176      $i++;
00177      $class= ( $i % 2 == 0 )?' class="odd"':"";
00178    
00179      echo "<TR $class>".
00180        "<TD>".$op['desc']."</TD>".
00181        "<TD align=\"right\">".sprintf("% 8.2f",$op['montant'])."</TD>".
00182        "</TR>";
00183    }
00184    echo "</table>";
00185 
00186  }
